skull.value: X is the number of Ghoul enemies at your location.

tablet.instant effect: If there is a Ghoul enemy at your location, take 1 damage.

skull.value: X is the highest number of doom on a Cultist enemy in play.

cultist.instant effect: Place 1 doom on the nearest Cultist enemy.

tablet.if fail: place 1 of your clues on your location.

skull.value: X is the number of Monster enemies in play.

cultist.instant effect: Place 1 doom on the nearest enemy.

tablet.instant effect: If there is a Monster enemy at your location, take 1 damage.

Elder Thing.reveal: If there is an Ancient One enemy in play, reveal another token.
